LanguageData.ARA_IncubationSpeedFactor.label: Incubation Speed
LanguageData.ARA_IncubationSpeedFactor.description: This indicates the multiplier for the incubation speed applied to the incubation vat.
LanguageData.NutrientTransmissionEfficiency.label: Biomass Transmission Loss
LanguageData.NutrientTransmissionEfficiency.descripti: Reduces fuel consumption when transmitting biomass. The final consumption amount is multiplied by (1 - Efficiency).
LanguageData.ARA_IncubationCost.label: Nutrients Required for Incubation
LanguageData.ARA_IncubationCost.description: This indicates the total amount of nutrients required to incubate this armed organ/tissue.
LanguageData.ARA_IncubationTime.label: Time Required for Incubation
LanguageData.ARA_IncubationTime.description: This indicates the time it takes to incubate this armed organ/tissue.
LanguageData.ARA_IcezKillingFactor.label: Flash-freeze Destruction Threshold
LanguageData.ARA_IcezKillingFactor.description: Indicates the percentage of body part HP required for a body part to be destroyed by freezing when taking cold damage.
